author: Jonathan Shieber
title: One month after White House pledges, access to testing and equipment still lags
description: One month after President Trump declared a national emergency and announced commitments from some of the nation’s largest companies to help expand testing capabilities in the U.S., most regions still lack access to the necessary tests and equipment they requi…
